title: "The New York Times prohibits AI vendors from devouring its content"
excerpt: "The New York Times updated its terms of service (TOS) to prohibit scraping its articles and images for AI training, reports Adweek. The move comes at a time when tech companies have continued to monetize AI language apps such as ChatGPT and Google Bard,"
